home.title: Cryptocurrency mining pool RuPool

feature1.title: High income

feature2.title: Daily payouts
feature2.description: We pay every day. No minimum threshold.

card1.title: Sign up on RuPool!
card1.text: Click 'Connect', you'll only need to create a secure password and provide an email address.

card2.title: Connect your hardware
card2.text: To start mining, specify the stratum for the required cryptocurrency. A stratum is the server address that the hardware contacts to receive tasks from the pool and submit solutions (shares).

card3.title: Set up payouts
card3.text: Choose a threshold and set the address for receiving earnings.

shared.emailSent: We've sent a confirmation email. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
shared.emailSuccessfullyConfirmed: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in.
shared.unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again later.
shared.callForUse: Start earning with our mining pool! A modern platform, transparent payouts, and maximum efficiency—everything is ready for your success in the world of cryptocurrency.

callForConnect.title: RuPool Mining Pool
callForConnect.text: We make mining simple, convenient, and profitable.

support.title: Still have questions?
support.text: Describe your case to get the most accurate advice in our Telegram support chat.
